wikipedia_page.main: David Burgess-Wise is a motoring author, enthusiast, and automobile historian.A motoring writer since 1960, Burgess-Wise has written 25 books on motoring history. He also edits the award-winning Aston, journal of the Aston Martin Heritage Trust.

response: * David Burgess-Wise - Automobile Archaeology (Cambridge, England: Patrick Stephens Ltd).
*David Burgess-Wise, motoring author and automobile historian
